Package fr.unice.polytech.citadelle.game

Class DeckCharacter

java.lang.Object
fr.unice.polytech.citadelle.game.DeckCharacter
public class DeckCharacter extends Object
A DeckCharacter is composed of all the character cards in the game.
Author:
BONNET Killian, IMAMI Ayoub, KARRAKCHOU Mourad, LE BIHAN LÃ©o

  • Method Details

    • chooseRandomCharacter

      public Character chooseRandomCharacter()

    • getDeckCharacter

      public ArrayList<Character> getDeckCharacter()
      Returns:
      A list of character cards a player can actually pick.

    • getHiddenCard

      public Character getHiddenCard()
      Returns:
      The card hid at the beginning of a round. The last player to play should be able to take it.

    • getBurnedAndVisibleCharacters

      public ArrayList<Character> getBurnedAndVisibleCharacters()
      Returns:
      A list of characters cards a player can see but can't pick (cards are burned).

    • getSize

      public int getSize()

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck()
      Called once at the beginning of each round. Shuffle the entire deck of charters.

    • calculateNbCardToBurn

      public int calculateNbCardToBurn()
      According to the number of players, the number of burned visible characters will not be the same.
      Returns:
      The number of characters we need to burn before starting taking a card.

    • burnCharacters

      public void burnCharacters()
      Burn a certain number of cards according to the number of players.

    • removeKingFromDeck

      public Character removeKingFromDeck()
      Remove the king form the list to properly burn characters card.
      Returns:
      The removed king card.

    • checkAndUpdateDeckForLastPlayer

      public void checkAndUpdateDeckForLastPlayer()
      Add the hidden card to deck when the last player of a game of 7 players is playing.

    • canPickTheHiddenCard

      public boolean canPickTheHiddenCard()
      According to the character selection advancement, the last player could take the hidden card.
      Returns:
      True/False - The player can take the hidden card.

    • hideCard

      public void hideCard()
      Hide the last card of the actual deck of character. The king character should not bo hid, so the next card will be hid.

    • deckStartRound

      public void deckStartRound()
      The 8 character cards are shuffled, face down, and a certain number are discarded and put aside. The player who has the card "Crown" takes the remaining character cards and secretly chooses one, which he places in front of him face down. He then passes the deck of cards to his neighbor on the left, who does the same, and so on. When the last player has taken one of the last two cards, he places the remaining card, face down, with the cards discarded at the start of the round.
